tool_description: Look up domain registry information using WHOIS protocol for any domain. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/whois.
name: Whois by API-Ninjas
title: Whois by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/whois
api_list.description: API Ninjas Whois API endpoint. Returns domain registration details (e.g. registrar, contact information, expiration date, name servers) about a particular domain name.
